videos.headline: Akron fumbles in own end zone, Northern Illinois recovers for TD
videos.description: Akron's Michiah Burton fumbles the ball in the end zone where it is recovered by Northern Illinois' Trayshon Foster for a defensive touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Akron fumbles in own end zone, Northern Illinois recovers for TD) 2019/10/26 ESHEET
